Test Steps: Search for a product using a keyword
Expected Result: Relevant products appear in search results

Expected Result: Cart updates correctly with no errors

Test Steps: Add items to wishlist and verify persistence

Test Steps: Resize browser window and test on BrowserStack

Test Case Description: Test blog and blog details page functionality

Expected Result: Blog and details load with accurate content

Test Steps: Add edit, and delete reviews and comments
Apply multiple filters and check product results

Test Case Description: Test error messages for API failures
